III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4158
Section Intervention standards and prohibitions
Description (1) A child caring institution shall establish and follow written
policies and procedures that prohibit the following forms of
intervention:
(a) Any type of physical punishment including, but not limited to:
1

(ii) Hitting or striking, throwing, kicking, pulling, or pushing a
youth on any part of their body.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation Staff member grabbed the youth by the collar and pushed the
youth's back against the wall.
Investigation Interviews:
Assistant Facility Administrator was interviewed via
telephone on 7/29/2025 in collaboration with MDHHS Worker.
Assistant Facility Administrator reported Youth A informed him of
the situation and upon review of video footage Staff 1 was viewed
to grab Youth A and push Youth A. Assistant Facility
Administrator reported no other concerns. Assistant Facility
Administrator reported Staff 1 has been suspended at this time.
Assistant Facility Administrator reported no other staff witnessed
the incident however other youth were present.
Chief Administrator was interviewed face-to-face at the
facility on 7/30/2025 in collaboration with MDHHS Worker.
Chief Administrator reported he became aware of the situation via
Assistant Facility Administrator and reviewed the video footage
where Staff 1 grabbed Youth A by the shirt and pushed Youth A
against the wall. Chief Administrator reported Staff 1 was
immediately suspended pending investigation. Chief
Administrator reported Staff 1 submitted a resignation letter to the
facility on 7/29/2025 and is no longer employed. Chief
Administrator reported no prior incidents with Staff 1.
Youth A was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on
7/30/2025 in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth A
refused to talk about the incident with Staff 1 and only reported he
was not hurt, nor did he have any injuries. Youth A reported this
was the first time anything had happened while at the facility.
Youth A was encouraged if he changed his mind and wished to
talk about the incident to notify Chief Administrator.
Youth B was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on
7/30/2025 in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth B
reported Youth A was “talking shit” and repeatedly asking for the
television remote. Youth B reported Staff 1 told Youth A he would
get the television remote, and Youth A got made and “squared up”
with Staff 1. Youth B reported Staff 1 pinned Youth A against the
wall by grabbing Youth A’s shirt around the collar area and
pushing Youth A to the wall. Youth B reported Staff 1 then let go
of Youth A and radioed for staff to come relieve him. Youth B
2

reported Staff 1 said something to Youth A however he did not
recall what. Youth B reported he has not seen Staff 1 since this
happened. Youth B reported this was the first time he had seen
something like this occur at the facility.
Youth C was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on
7/30/2025 in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth C
reported on the way back to the unit from school Youth A asked
Staff 1 for the television remote repeatedly. Youth C reported
Staff 1 “had a lot on his plate and was stressed” however Youth C
did not know why. Youth C reported when Staff 1 got back to the
unit he put his hands on his head as Youth A asked for the
television remote again and Staff 1 “got mad”. Youth C reported
Youth A got in Staff 1’s face and Staff 1 pushed Youth A against
the wall and said, “I’m not playing”. Staff 1 let Youth A go and told
Youth A to go to the hallway as Staff 1 radioed for someone to
come relieve him on the unit. Youth C reported this was the first
time he has seen something like this occur at the facility.
Youth D was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on
7/30/2025 in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth D
reported while walking back to the unit Youth A was repeatedly
asking Staff 1 for the television remote. Youth D reported Staff 1
threw his pen on the ground and began pulling his own hair as he
was “stressed”. Youth D reported Staff 1 seemed stressed based
on his response of throwing the pen on the ground and pulling his
own hair. Youth D reported upon getting on the unit Youth A
asked for the remote again and Staff 1 said “you think your tough”
and grabbed Youth A by the shirt with both his hands near Youth
A's collar and “put” Youth A against the wall. Youth D reported
Youth A told Staff 1 to put him down and Staff 1 let go of Youth A
and Staff 1 radioed for staff to come relieve him from the unit.
Youth D reported this was the first time he had seen something
like this occur at the facility.
Staff 1 was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on
7/30/2025 in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Staff 1
reported Youth A was agitated from the time he woke up that
morning and was “sizing up staff to fight”. Staff 1 reported Youth
A was repeatedly saying “I’ll fuck you up” and Staff 1 reported he
“just snapped”. Staff 1 reported he grabbed Youth A by the shirt
with one hand and pushed him into the wall and said, “I’m not
playing the childish games”. Staff 1 radioed for staff to come to
relieve him from the unit. Staff 1 reported he knew he was wrong
for what he did and was immediately suspended. Staff 1 reported
3

he submitted his resignation to the facility as he knows his actions
were not appropriate.
Video Reviewed:
Video footage of 7/28/2025 in Oak unit was reviewed on
7/30/2025. Staff 1 walked into the unit with Youth A, Youth B,
Youth C, and Youth D following as well as two additional youth
who are no longer at the facility. Staff 1 paced the unit and looked
over at Youth A as Youth A entered and pulled his right arm back
in a fast-punching motion. Youth A and Staff 1 face each other
and Youth A raised his hands into a fighting stance. Staff 1
appeared to be talking to Youth A however the video does not
have sound. Staff 1 walked in toward Youth A and Staff 1
grabbed Youth A’s collar area of his shirt with Staff 1’s left hand
and pushed Youth A against the wall as he had a hold of Youth
A’s shirt. Staff 1 released his hand from Youth A’s shirt and
stepped back from Youth A. Youth A walked into the hall and Staff
1 put his radio to his mouth.
Documents Reviewed:
• Youth Opportunity Investments Incident Report dated
7/28/2025 for Youth A: Youth A reported Staff 1 pushed
him up against the wall. Staff 1 was suspended pending
investigation.
• Osceola Youth Center Safe Crisis Management and
Physical Intervention Policy: Prohibited practices include
hitting or striking, throwing, kicking, pulling, or pushing a
youth on any part of their body.
• Staff 1’s personnel file: Staff 1 had one discipline regarding
time and attendance dated 4/29/2024. Staff 1 was trained
on Safe Crisis Management on 3/19-3/20/2025.
Analysis The facility is found in noncompliance as per interviews and video
review Staff 1 grabbed Youth A by the collar area of his shirt and
pushed Youth A against the wall.
Conclusion Repeat Violation Established
SI 2025C0001140SI dated 4/11/2024, CAP Approved 5/9/2024
IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on investigative findings the facility is not in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. Upon receipt of an acceptable corrective action plan, it
is recommended that the current license status be continued.
